title: Skip timed out tests in Sandcastle
body_html: Because the Sandcastle tests are run as a bundle, disabling individual test cases doesn't have an effect on whether those tests will be run in the test suite (e.g. test_type_casts is disabled 3 days ago, but caffe2/test:nn_3 - main still runs it and fails in GreenWarden). Instead we probably need a way in the code to mark whether a test should be skipped in Sandcastle.
body_text: Because the Sandcastle tests are run as a bundle, disabling individual test cases doesn't have an effect on whether those tests will be run in the test suite (e.g. test_type_casts is disabled 3 days ago, but caffe2/test:nn_3 - main still runs it and fails in GreenWarden). Instead we probably need a way in the code to mark whether a test should be skipped in Sandcastle.
body: Because the Sandcastle tests are run as a bundle, disabling individual test cases doesn't have an effect on whether those tests will be run in the test suite (e.g. `test_type_casts` is disabled 3 days ago, but `caffe2/test:nn_3 - main` still runs it and fails in GreenWarden). Instead we probably need a way in the code to mark whether a test should be skipped in Sandcastle.
